name: Ultimatum
overview: In the year 2030 violent outlaws, known as Transgressors, continually attack and ravage cities across the world. Standing between these urban terrorists and total anarchy are the Vindicators. But now, the Vindicators have decreed that it is time to end the fighing once and for all. Future historians will remember this as the... Ultimatum. In this single-player 3D tank game , the object is to fight and defeat a series of 8 opponents. Each game lasts until either tank's shields are completely destroyed. Your ammo is limited and you must reload at the reload bay indicated on your HUD.
